title: Wounded (4R215)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	To play, exert an [Isengard] Man. Plays on a Free Peoples Man. When you play this condition, exert bearer. Wounds may not be removed from bearer.
Lore:	”'He's alive!'”
Rarity:	R
